messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Hi, what kinds of Pokémon do you
have with you?I’ll show you my Pokémon while we
have a battle.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Huh? It’s over?!
I thought I’d win!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
You’re too tough!
I won’t battle you again!Just joking! I’ll challenge you again
when I level up my Pokémon.
